====Usage notes====
{{lang|ja|家族}} refers to one’s own family, particularly ''immediate'' family – parents, children, and siblings. To refer to another’s family, one uses the honorific form {{m|ja|ご家族|tr=go-kazoku||another’s family|pos=honorific}}. To refer to one’s relatives generally, one uses {{m|ja|親戚|tr=shinseki||relative}}, which includes even distant relatives. For close relatives – say, aunts, uncles, and close cousins – one may use {{m|ja|近親|tr=kinshin||close relative}}. For close people, not necessarily family, one may use {{m|ja|身内|tr=miuchi||close family, close friends}}.
